name: French Quarter
description: The historic heart of New Orleans, known for its vibrant nightlife and colorful buildings.

name: Jackson Square
description: A historic park in the French Quarter, featuring street performers and artists.

name: Bourbon Street
description: Famous for its lively bars and music scene, a must-visit for nightlife enthusiasts.

name: Garden District
description: Known for its well-preserved historic mansions and oak-lined streets.

name: Audubon Zoo
description: A family-friendly attraction featuring exotic animals and lush gardens.

name: St. Louis Cathedral
address: 615 Pere Antoine Alley, New Orleans, LA 70116
description: A stunning historic cathedral located in Jackson Square.

name: City Park
description: A large urban park with beautiful landscapes, museums, and recreational activities.

name: National WWII Museum
description: A world-renowned museum dedicated to the history of World War II.
